problem.title: What is MAPS?
problem.p: How did you find the level of this video?

choicegroup.submitted_message: Thank you for submitting your response.

choice.name: foil1
choice.p: It was at too high a level.

choice.name: foil2
choice.p: It was at the right level.

choice.name: foil3
choice.p: It was at too low a level.
